official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on certain agricultural sprayer parts.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on certain agricultural sprayer parts.

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on certain agricultural sprayer parts.
